nl.inl.blacklab.tools

Class QueryTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.tools.QueryTool

  • public class QueryTool
extends Object
    Simple command-line querying tool for BlackLab indices.

                 BufferedReader in,
                 PrintWriter out,
                 PrintWriter err)
          throws org.apache.lucene.index.CorruptIndexException
        Construct the query tool object.
        Parameters:
        index - the index object (our index)
        in - where to read commands from
        out - where to write output to
        err - where to write errors to
        Throws:
        org.apache.lucene.index.CorruptIndexException

      • QueryTool

        public QueryTool(File indexDir,
                 BufferedReader in,
                 PrintWriter out,
                 PrintWriter err)
          throws ErrorOpeningIndex
        Construct the query tool object.
        Parameters:
        indexDir - directory our index is in
        in - where to read commands from
        out - where to write output to
        err - where to write errors to
        Throws:
        ErrorOpeningIndex - if we couldn't open the index

      • QueryTool

                 PrintWriter out,
                 PrintWriter err)
          throws ErrorOpeningIndex
        Construct the query tool object.
        Parameters:
        indexDir - directory our index is in
        out - the output writer to use
        err - where to write errors to
        Throws:
        ErrorOpeningIndex - if index could not be opened
